document_data.title: Weapons
document_data.realm year: [[Eleint 12]]-[[Eleint 13|13]], [[1358 DR]]<ref>{{Cite organized play/LC/Dark Harvest|9,34-35}}<ref group="note" name="date">The adventure takes place on the 10{{th}} anniversary of Alice Clarkson's death, which is stated to have occured on [[Eleint 13]], [[1348 DR]]. And date given for [[Cedric Clarkson]]'s last journal entry is [[Eleint 11]], [[1358 DR]]. This would place the adventure between the 12{{th}} and 13{{th}} of Eleint in the year 1358 DR.
